className.content: hover:shadow-round-btn-shadow flex h-11 items-center justify-center gap-7 rounded-md border bg-background px-1.5 shadow transition-all
flex h-full w-full gap-1.5 rounded-sm transition-all

content.content: Add a Chat Input or Chat Output to use the playground

content.id: hasIO ? (isPublished ? encodeURI(`${domain}/playground/${flowId}`) : 'Activate to share a public version of this Playground') : 'Add a Chat Input or Chat Output to access your flow'
